specification.description: A friendly ship heading northward through a region with two hostile boats on patrol. If the hostile boats see the friendly ship they will attack. The friendly ship also has a direct fire weapon to defend itself. However, it tends to be outnumbered. . The friendly ship also has a UAV following a random search pattern. If the UAV finds a hostile boat then it will relay the information to the friendly ship which will then launch an indirect fire weapon onto the enemy boat. . Open the MiniMap from the View pulldown menu. Size of region = 10 km x 10 km. Size seen in main MANA view = 4 km x 4 km. . .
